titleStmt.title: The hunting of the pox a pleasant discourse betweene the authour, and pild-garlicke : wherein is declared the nature of the dissease, how it came, and how it may bee cured / by J. T. Westminster.
titleStmt.author: J. T., of Westminster.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.W. for I.T. and are to be sold by Philip Birch at the signe of the Bible neere Guildhall-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible neere Guildhall-gate
